adult.title: Osteopathy for Adults
adult.description: Comprehensive body work: diagnostics, gentle techniques, recommendations. Suitable for back pain, neck pain, headaches, and injury recovery.

doctor.intro: I am Bykava Hanna, an osteopath since 2018. I believe in people and make this world a little better every day.

osteopathy.title: Osteopathy
osteopathy.text: Osteopathy is a holistic approach to health based on understanding the interconnections of all body systems. Every person is unique, and I approach treatment individually, taking into account the characteristics of your body and lifestyle.

reviews.title: Reviews - OsteoJump
reviews.hero_platforms: 100+ on Instagram ‚Ä¢ 40+ on Booksy ‚Ä¢ 10+ on Google
reviews.award_subtitle: Laureate of Or≈Çy Medycyny 2025 in Warsaw
reviews.award_description: This award is given for high ratings in the medical field. Thank you to all clients for your trust and reviews!
reviews.cta_thanks_text: Your reviews help others and inspire me to grow.

review1.text: Anna is a wonderful specialist, a true professional and a very pleasant person. I contacted her twice during the year. The first time was for my persistent back pain at that time. After the second session it became easier, after the fourth I forgot what a sore back was. Recently there was a problem with my neck. I didn't buy any ointments or pills, I immediately turned to Anna. Everything is fine now! I recommend everyone who is not yet familiar with osteopathy to come to Anna for an appointment.

review2.text: Hello! We contacted you in 2022 regarding our daughter's stuttering, and after the session everything passed)) she was 1 year and 11 months old

review3.text: Anna has gentle hands!! The entire session was a pleasure! Anna put my pelvis and ribs back in place after pregnancy (the ribs on one side, where the baby's bottom was during pregnancy, stuck out 2 cm higher than the other side). I feel light again now! Anna also adjusted my child's skull sutures as there was strong pressure during childbirth and one part of the skull overlapped the other, corrected torticollis and removed excessive tone in one arm. Everything else needs to be reinforced with exercises and massage. I needed one session, and my child needed 2. The child feels calmer and sleeps better üíñ. I will definitely come back when I'm in Poland! Thank you üôè

review4.text: I came with neck problems and a feeling of suffocation. After two or three sessions, I felt significant relief. Very glad I found Anna) Thanks to her wonderful hands, I feel much better! Thank you so much‚ù§Ô∏è

review5.text:
After the first session, I felt the anxiety and tension leave my body ‚Äî tension that had been with me for a good decade. The steel hoop that squeezed my ribs even with a small breath disappeared, and I finally breathe fully ü•π

The session itself was very gentle, no discomfort or pain, it felt like you were just stroked and lightly massaged, but don't be fooled üòÅ a day later such muscle soreness appears that it becomes obvious which deep muscles/ligaments were involved that hadn't worked in years.

Anna is very attentive, polite, pleasant, modest girl, which is very important for me ‚Äî with medical education.

I recommend everyone to visit Anna at least once, this is, without exaggeration, a different quality of life.

Thank you so much ü´∂

review6.text: Incredibly sensitive approach and super professional treatment. I highly recommend Dr. Hanna Bykava. She helped relieve a long, painful condition and established the necessary treatment rules. This was a life-changing session, and it was only the first one!

short2.text: "Anna is a great professional, very kind person"
short2.author: ‚Äî Maria

short3.text: "Thank you Anna for the session, everything was great!"
short3.author: ‚Äî Olga

short6.text: "I recommend with all my heart! Improvement in well-being right away"
short6.author: ‚Äî Weronika

short8.text: "Everything was wonderful, stiffness and pain disappeared"
short8.author: ‚Äî Anastasia K.

about_page.title: About Me
about_page.meta_title: Anna Bykova ‚Äî Osteopath in Warsaw | OsteoJump
about_page.subtitle: Information about me coming soon
about_page.content: This page is under development. Soon information about me and my work experience will be posted here.
about_page.intro: Osteopathy is in my heart, in my hands, and in my thinking.
about_page.education: By basic education, I am a midwife and a laboratory diagnostics doctor, which gives me a deep understanding of physiology, biochemical processes, and interconnections in the human body.
about_page.experience: I have been practicing osteopathy professionally since 2018.
about_page.location: I live and work in Warsaw, where I see adults and children.
about_page.approach_title: In my practice, I use a comprehensive osteopathic approach, including:
about_page.conclusion: Every patient is unique to me. In my work, I strive not only to alleviate symptoms but also to find the root cause of disorders, helping the body restore balance and activate its own resources for self-healing.
about_page.see_education: For more details about education and certificates, visit the Education page.
about_page.hero_tagline: Helping babies, mothers, and adults gently and with care
about_page.children_text: I welcome little ones from their first days of life. I gently help with consequences of difficult births, muscle tone issues, torticollis, colic, sleep problems, and restlessness. It's important to me that every baby feels safe ‚Äî I work tenderly, respecting each child's unique needs.
about_page.children_experience: I have experience as a midwife in a maternity hospital. I know what a child goes through during birth and understand how it can affect their body.
about_page.mothers_text: During planning ‚Äî I help prepare the body for future changes. During pregnancy ‚Äî I gently and safely help manage headaches, sleep problems, discomfort, and help the baby get into the right position. After birth ‚Äî recover faster and restore the body to its normal state.
about_page.mothers_experience: I am a mother myself, so I truly understand what you are going through.
about_page.adults_text: Back and neck pain, headaches, consequences of injuries, chronic tension ‚Äî these are the most common reasons adults come to me. I work with the body holistically ‚Äî looking for the real cause, not just relieving symptoms. I also take on complex cases.
about_page.adults_experience: Including cases where traditional medicine falls short: migraines, panic attacks, reflux, TMJ issues, painful periods, chronic fatigue, light sensitivity, unstable blood pressure, and more.
about_page.journey_text1: My path into medicine began with midwifery. Working in a maternity hospital, I saw every day how babies are born ‚Äî and how differently it can happen. That is when I began to understand how important what happens to a baby's body in the first minutes and days of life is.
about_page.journey_text2: Later I received my degree as a laboratory diagnostics doctor from Belarusian State Medical University. But I wanted to work with people directly ‚Äî to help with my hands, not just with test results.
about_page.journey_text3: Everything changed when I discovered osteopathy. I was impressed by how gentle techniques can produce such results. Since 2018, I have been practicing osteopathy, constantly learning and improving.
about_page.journey_text4: Now I live in Warsaw, raising my daughter and helping patients ‚Äî from newborns to adults.
about_page.motivation_text1: Modern medicine saves lives ‚Äî and I am sincerely grateful for everything it has taught me. Protocols, standards, specializations ‚Äî all of this was created to help millions of people. And it works.
about_page.motivation_text2: But sometimes I wanted more. Not because the system is bad ‚Äî it is simply designed for a different scale. When you have hundreds of patients, it is difficult to give each one as much attention as you would like. It is no one's fault ‚Äî just reality.
about_page.motivation_text3: Working in a maternity hospital, I saw how differently births can go. I saw babies who struggled in the first days. I saw mothers who needed support. And I often felt: I want to help more than the framework I am in allows.
about_page.motivation_text4: When I became a mother myself, this feeling only intensified. I understood how important it is for someone to look at you ‚Äî specifically at you, not at a diagnosis or protocol.
about_page.motivation_text5: Osteopathy gave me this opportunity. Here I can take my time. I can see the whole person ‚Äî their history, their body, their needs. I can work without templates, choosing what is right specifically for you.
about_page.motivation_conclusion: This is not a rejection of medicine ‚Äî it is its continuation. Just in a different, more personal format.
about_page.approach_text1: Every session begins with a conversation. It is important for me to understand your history, complaints, and lifestyle. Then comes hands-on diagnosis: I assess tissue mobility, looking for tensions and restrictions.
about_page.approach_text2: I work gently. I use cranial, visceral, and structural techniques ‚Äî depending on what you specifically need. My goal is not to force the body, but to help it restore balance.
about_page.approach_text3: After the session, I explain what I found and what you can do at home to maintain the results.
about_page.principle1_text: ‚Äî delicate techniques suitable even for newborns
about_page.principle2_text: ‚Äî no template protocols, only your body and its needs
about_page.principle3_text: ‚Äî I view the body as a unified system
about_page.principle4_text: ‚Äî I do not promise what I cannot guarantee
about_page.cta_text: If you are not sure whether osteopathy is right for you, or want to learn more ‚Äî write to me. I will be happy to answer.
about_page.cta_location: I see patients in Warsaw, Ursus district. You can book through Booksy, WhatsApp, or Telegram.
about_page.booksy_rating: on Booksy ‚Äî all reviews are positive
about_page.approach_brief_text1: Every session begins with a conversation and hands-on diagnosis. I work gently, using cranial, visceral, and structural techniques ‚Äî depending on what you specifically need.
about_page.approach_brief_text2: My goal is not to force the body, but to help it restore balance. After the session, I explain what I found and what you can do at home.

appointment_page.title: How a Session Works - OsteoJump
appointment_page.hero_subtitle: What to expect from an osteopathy session
appointment_page.step1_text: Every session begins with a conversation. It is important for me to understand your history, complaints, and lifestyle. This helps build a complete picture and find the root cause of the problem.
appointment_page.step2_text: Then I perform hands-on diagnostics: I assess tissue mobility, looking for tensions and restrictions. This helps me understand which techniques will be most effective.
appointment_page.step3_text: I work gently. I use cranial, visceral, and structural techniques ‚Äî depending on what you specifically need. My goal is not to force the body, but to help it restore balance.
appointment_page.step4_text: After the session, I explain what I found and what you can do at home to maintain the results. If necessary, I recommend a plan for further visits.
appointment_page.process_text1: Every osteopathy session is unique because every person is unique. I do not use template protocols ‚Äî I work with what your body shows me in the moment.
appointment_page.process_text2: Osteopathic techniques can be directed at different structures: muscles and fascia, internal organs, skull and sacrum. The choice of technique depends on your problem and individual characteristics.
appointment_page.process_text3: Session duration is usually 45-60 minutes for adults and 30-45 minutes for children.
appointment_page.principle1_text: Delicate techniques suitable even for newborns. Working with the body without pain or discomfort.
appointment_page.principle2_text: No template protocols, only your body and its needs. Every session is adapted to you.
appointment_page.principle3_text: I view the body as a unified system. I look for the root cause, not just relieve symptoms.
appointment_page.principle4_text: I do not promise what I cannot guarantee. I am honest about possibilities and limitations.
appointment_page.cta_text: If you have questions about how a session works, or want to book ‚Äî contact me.

education.title: Education - OsteoJump
education.hero_text: Trained at Upledger Institute, Barral Institute, finishing Warsaw Osteopathic Medicine Academy.

location.title: How to Find Us - OsteoJump
location.subtitle: 02-495 Warsaw, Poland
location.step1_desc: Red building with number 39. There are two entrances ‚Äî you need the left one
location.step2_desc: Main entrance under the wooden canopy, sign ¬´Si≈Çaczki 3/9¬ª
location.step3_desc: The elevator is right in front of the entrance
location.step5_desc: On the 2nd floor, exit the elevator, turn left after 2 meters
location.step6_desc: Straight down the corridor, then turn left
location.step7_desc: Gently knock on the door at your appointment time. There are chairs nearby for waiting

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently asked questions coming soon
faq.content: This page is under development. Soon answers to frequently asked questions will be posted here.
faq.hero_subtitle: Answers to common questions about osteopathy
faq.q1_answer: The session begins with a conversation and medical history, followed by hands-on diagnostics and gentle osteopathic work. Sessions last 45-60 minutes for adults and 30-45 minutes for children.
faq.q2_answer: Osteopathy is a method of manual diagnostics and treatment based on understanding the interconnections of all body structures. An osteopath works with muscles, fascia, organs, skull bones, and spine, helping the body restore its natural balance.
faq.q3_answer: No, osteopathic techniques are gentle and painless. Work is done delicately, taking into account your body's response. Techniques are suitable even for newborns and pregnant women.
faq.q4_answer: It depends on your problem and health condition. Often improvement is felt after the first session. For lasting results, 3-5 sessions with 1-2 week intervals are usually recommended.
faq.q5_answer: Comfortable clothes that do not restrict movement. A cotton t-shirt and light pants or leggings work well. Work is done with clothes on, no need to undress.
faq.q6_answer: Yes, osteopathy is safe for children of any age, including newborns. Children's techniques are even gentler and adapted to the characteristics of a growing body.
faq.q7_title: How do I book an appointment?
faq.q7_answer: You can book through Booksy, WhatsApp, or by calling. The 'Book Appointment' button is at the bottom of the page.
faq.q8_title: What's the difference between a consultation and a full session?
faq.q8_answer: A consultation (20 min) is an introduction. We'll discuss your concerns, I'll do an initial assessment, and explain how I can help. It's perfect if you're unsure or want to understand if osteopathy is right for you. A full session (55 min) is complete bodywork: detailed diagnostics and osteopathic treatment.
faq.contraindications_answer: Absolute contraindications are rare: acute infections, active cancer, severe mental disorders, conditions requiring emergency care. Otherwise, osteopathy is safe ‚Äî techniques are selected individually.
faq.anxiety_title: Are sessions safe for anxiety and panic attacks?
faq.anxiety_answer: Yes, moreover ‚Äî osteopathy often helps with anxiety. Gentle bodywork releases tension, improves breathing, and helps the nervous system 'reset'. Many notice improvement after the first session.
faq.elderly_title: Is osteopathy suitable for elderly people?
faq.elderly_answer: Yes, osteopathy is suitable for people of any age. For elderly patients, I use especially gentle techniques, considering the body's characteristics. It helps with chronic pain, stiffness, and mobility issues.
faq.combine_title: Can osteopathy be combined with other treatments?
faq.combine_answer: Yes, osteopathy complements other methods well: physiotherapy, massage, orthodontic treatment, psychotherapy. It's important to tell me about all your procedures so I can coordinate the bodywork.
faq.insurance_answer: It depends on your insurance company and policy. Some insurance plans in Poland cover osteopath visits. I provide a receipt (faktura) that can be sent to insurance for reimbursement.
faq.reasons_title: What problems do people see an osteopath for?
faq.reasons_answer: Back pain, neck pain, headaches, migraines, injury consequences, chronic fatigue, digestive issues, sleep disorders, anxiety. Also ‚Äî birth preparation, postpartum recovery, working with children from birth.
faq.stress_title: Does osteopathy help with stress and fatigue?
faq.stress_answer: Yes, chronic stress 'records' in the body: tense shoulders, restricted breathing, headaches. Osteopathy helps release physical tension, improving overall well-being and sleep quality.
faq.after_injury_title: Can I visit after injuries and surgeries?
faq.after_injury_answer: Yes, but after the acute recovery period. Osteopathy helps the body adapt to changes, works with scars and adhesions, restores mobility. Timing depends on the type of injury or surgery ‚Äî we'll discuss individually.
faq.hernia_title: Does osteopathy work with hernias and protrusions?
faq.hernia_answer: Yes, for hernias and protrusions, osteopathy helps relieve muscle tension, improve blood supply, and reduce pain. I work gently, without sudden manipulations. The goal is to create conditions for recovery.
faq.orthodontics_title: Why see an osteopath during orthodontic treatment?
faq.orthodontics_answer: Bite is connected to posture, skull, and neck position. An osteopath helps the body adapt to changes from braces or aligners, relieves jaw tension, and improves orthodontic treatment results.
faq.pregnancy_planning_title: Is an osteopath needed when planning pregnancy?
faq.pregnancy_planning_answer: It can be helpful. An osteopath helps prepare the body for future changes: works with the pelvis, sacrum, improves blood supply to pelvic organs. Especially relevant for conception difficulties.
faq.pregnancy_issues_title: What can pregnant women see an osteopath for?
faq.pregnancy_issues_answer: Back and pelvic pain, heartburn, swelling, headaches, sleep disturbances, uterine tone. I also help the baby assume the correct position before birth. I work gently and safely at any stage.
faq.postpartum_when_title: When can I see an osteopath after giving birth?
faq.postpartum_when_answer: You can visit as early as 2-4 weeks after natural birth (after cesarean ‚Äî 6-8 weeks). Early visits help the body recover faster and prevent chronic problems from forming.
faq.postpartum_reasons_title: What do women see an osteopath for after giving birth?
faq.postpartum_reasons_answer: Back and pelvic pain, diastasis, organ prolapse, urination issues, pain while breastfeeding, headaches, fatigue. Osteopathy helps the body return to form after pregnancy and childbirth.
faq.cesarean_title: Does osteopathy help after cesarean section?
faq.cesarean_answer: Yes, after the scar heals (usually 6-8 weeks). Osteopathy helps work with the scar and adhesions, restores tissue mobility, relieves tension in the abdomen and pelvis.
faq.infants_reasons_title: What do parents bring infants to an osteopath for?
faq.infants_reasons_answer: Consequences of difficult births, torticollis, head asymmetry, colic, frequent spitting up, sleep disturbances, restlessness, breastfeeding latch problems. The earlier you visit, the easier it is to help the baby.
faq.colic_sleep_title: Does osteopathy help with colic and sleep issues?
faq.colic_sleep_answer: Yes, colic is often related to tension in the baby's tummy or nervous system. Gentle osteopathic work helps release this tension. Parents usually notice improved sleep and behavior after the first sessions.
faq.autism_title: Is osteopathy suitable for children with autism?
faq.autism_answer: Yes, osteopathy can help children with ASD. Gentle bodywork helps reduce sensory overload, improve sleep, and overall well-being. I work at the child's pace, considering their characteristics.
faq.children_reasons_title: What do parents bring older children for?
faq.children_reasons_answer: Posture problems, headaches, concentration issues, injury consequences, frequent colds, bedwetting, developmental delays. Osteopathy helps children grow healthy and develop harmoniously.
faq.after_session_title: What to expect after a session?
faq.after_session_answer: On the day of the session, I recommend resting and drinking more water. In the first 1-3 days, mild fatigue or temporary symptom increase is possible ‚Äî this is a normal body response to changes. Improvement usually follows.
faq.worse_after_title: What if I feel worse after the session?
faq.worse_after_answer: Temporary worsening in the first 1-3 days is a normal reaction. The body is adapting to changes. If symptoms persist longer or cause concern ‚Äî write to me, and we'll figure it out together.
faq.payment_methods_answer: I accept card, cash, BLIK, and bank transfer payments. Choose whichever is most convenient for you.
faq.blik_answer: Yes, BLIK payment is available. It's fast and convenient ‚Äî just share the code from your banking app.
faq.discounts_answer: Yes, there are family packages and discounts when purchasing multiple sessions. See the prices page for details or ask when booking.
faq.gift_certificate_title: Can I buy a gift certificate?
faq.gift_certificate_answer: Yes, you can purchase a certificate for any amount or specific service. A great gift for loved ones ‚Äî write to me, and I'll prepare the certificate.
faq.booking_without_booksy_answer: Yes, you can book via WhatsApp, Telegram, or phone. Booksy is convenient for choosing your own time, but if you prefer personal contact ‚Äî just write or call.
faq.no_convenient_time_title: I can't find a convenient time in the schedule
faq.no_convenient_time_answer: Write or call me ‚Äî tell me what time works for you. I'll help find options, even if they're not currently shown in the online schedule.
faq.invoice_title: Can I get a receipt or invoice?
faq.invoice_answer: Yes, I provide an invoice (faktura) upon request. You can use it for insurance reimbursement or tax deduction.

hero.intro: I am Hanna Bykava, an osteopath. I believe in people and make this world a little better every day.

r1.title: Gentle, safe techniques
r1.text: No cracking or sudden movements. Many clients fall asleep during sessions

r2.title: No alternatives
r2.text: Osteopathy works with the cause, not the symptoms. Neither massage nor chiropractic offers this

r3.title: Virtually no contraindications
r3.text: Suitable for newborns, pregnant women, and the elderly

r4.title: Holistic approach
r4.text: I view the body as one unified system. Neck pain can originate from the pelvis

r5.title: Helps when doctors can't
r5.text: Migraines, panic attacks, chronic fatigue ‚Äî cases where no cause is found

r6.title: Fast results
r6.text: Many feel improvement after just the first session

education.title: Education
education.text: Medical university, specialization in osteopathy. Constantly improving my skills

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: 15 years in medicine, 7 years in osteopathy. Over 1000 patients

results.title: Results
results.text: 5.0 rating and 150+ positive reviews. Or≈Çy Medycyny 2025 Laureate

approach.title: Individual approach
approach.text: No template protocols. I work with your body and its needs

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.text: Patients return and recommend me to friends and family

complex.title: Complex cases
complex.text: I take on unique cases where traditional medicine hasn't helped

motivation.title: Don't postpone taking care of your health
motivation.text: Acute problem ‚Äî 1-2 sessions. Chronic ‚Äî months of work. The sooner you start, the faster the results.

questions.title: Still have questions?
questions.text: Don't know what to expect? Have many questions? Check out the FAQ or book a consultation.

osteopathy_page.title: What is Osteopathy - OsteoJump
osteopathy_page.hero_subtitle: A natural, gentle treatment method that addresses the root cause of problems, not just symptoms
osteopathy_page.principle1_text: The body is a unified system where everything is interconnected. A problem in one area can manifest as pain in another.
osteopathy_page.principle2_text: The body is capable of healing itself. The osteopath's task is to remove obstacles and help the body initiate this process.
osteopathy_page.principle3_text: A healthy body structure ensures healthy function. Restricted mobility leads to organ dysfunction.
osteopathy_page.principle4_text: An osteopath finds and eliminates the root cause of the problem, not just relieves pain. This provides long-term results.
osteopathy_page.step1_text: The osteopath assesses tissue mobility, finding areas of tension and movement restriction
osteopathy_page.step2_text: Identifies the root cause of dysfunction ‚Äî often located far from the site of pain
osteopathy_page.step3_text: Using delicate techniques, restores mobility and balance in the body
osteopathy_page.cta_title: Discover how osteopathy can help you

consultation_page.title: Consultation - OsteoJump
consultation_page.hero_subtitle: The first step to understanding your situation
consultation_page.intro: If you've been searching for a solution to your problem but haven't found an answer yet, a consultation can be a good first step.
consultation_page.description: It's a calm, individual meeting with an osteopath where we carefully examine your situation, listen to you, and try to understand what's happening with your body and how we can help.
consultation_page.no_obligation: No treatment and no obligation to continue therapy.
consultation_page.includes_1: discuss your complaints and the history of the problem
consultation_page.includes_2: talk about what you've already tried and the results
consultation_page.includes_4: explain whether osteopathy can be helpful for you specifically
consultation_page.includes_5: describe how the treatment usually works and how many sessions may be needed
consultation_page.includes_6: discuss possible sensations and expected outcomes
consultation_page.result_title: As a result of the consultation
consultation_page.result_text: You'll gain a clear understanding of whether osteopathy is right for you and whether to start treatment.
consultation_page.result_target: Ideal for those who want to understand their situation and make an informed decision.
consultation_page.appointment_link: Learn how a full session works ‚Üí
